m_szDocTitle: Patent US8088512 - Self organizing battery structure method - Google Patents
m_szDocSumamry: Self organizing battery structure method US 8088512 B2 Abstract An electrochemical device includes a first electrode in electrical communication with a first current collector, a second electrode in electrical communication with a second current collector and a crosslinked solid polymer in contact with the first and second electrodes. At least one of the first and second electrodes includes a network of electrically connected particles comprising an electroactive material, and the particles of one electrode exert a repelling force on the other electrode when the first and second electrodes are
